Private Cloud Drive

← Back to Documentation

Overview

Our Private Cloud Drive service provides secure, reliable cloud storage with generous free tier and affordable upgrade options. Store your files safely with automatic backups and access them from anywhere.

Features

  • Secure Storage: End-to-end encryption for all files
  • Cross-Platform Access: Web interface and mobile apps
  • File Sharing: Share files and folders with expiration dates
  • Version History: Keep multiple versions of your files
  • Automatic Backup: Set up folder sync for automatic backups
  • Redundant Storage: Files stored across multiple servers for reliability

Pricing

Free Tier

  • 100GB storage
  • Basic file sharing
  • Web interface access
  • 30-day version history

Cost: Free

Standard Plan

  • 150GB storage (+50GB from free tier)
  • Advanced sharing options
  • Mobile app access
  • 90-day version history
  • Priority support

Cost: £1/month

Pro Plan

  • 1TB storage (18×50GB blocks)
  • Unlimited sharing
  • Advanced sync options
  • 1-year version history
  • Custom branding for shared links

Cost: £18/month

How to Get Started

Step 1: Request Access

  1. Email drive@pez.solutions
  2. Include your desired username and email address
  3. Specify which plan you're interested in (free tier is default)

Step 2: Account Setup

  1. You'll receive setup instructions via email
  2. Create your secure password
  3. Set up two-factor authentication (recommended)

Step 3: Start Using

  1. Access the web interface at your provided URL
  2. Download mobile apps if needed
  3. Upload your first files

Supported File Types

All file types are supported, including:

  • Documents (PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
  • Images (JPEG, PNG, GIF, SVG, RAW formats)
  • Videos (MP4, AVI, MOV, MKV, etc.)
  • Audio (MP3, FLAC, WAV, etc.)
  • Archives (ZIP, RAR, 7z, etc.)
  • Code files and development projects

File Sharing

Sharing Options

  • Public Links: Anyone with the link can access
  • Password Protected: Require password for access
  • Expiration Dates: Links automatically expire
  • Download Limits: Limit number of downloads
  • Folder Sharing: Share entire folders with collaborators

Mobile Apps

Native mobile apps are available for iOS and Android, offering full functionality including:

  • File upload from camera or gallery
  • Offline access to selected files
  • Automatic photo backup
  • Push notifications for shared files

Data Security

Security Features

  • Files encrypted at rest and in transit
  • Regular security audits
  • Geographically distributed backups
  • Two-factor authentication support
  • Activity logging and monitoring

Support

For drive-related issues or questions about upgrading plans, contact drive@pez.solutions.
